text: Kevin Reardon Lloyd (28 March 1949 in Derby â€“ died 2 May 1998 in Burton-on- Trent) was a British actor best known for playing DC Alfred Tosh Lines in ITV The Bill, Harry Blackburn in Auf Wiedersen, Pet and Don Watkins in Coronation Street. He has also appeared in Britannia Hospital, Link, Don't Open till Christmas, Billy the Kid and the Green Baize Vampire, A Dirty Knight's Work. He was the older brother of ITN journalist Terry Lloyd. ==Other websites== * *Find a Grave Category:1949 births Category:1998 deaths Category:British actors
title: Kevin Lloyd
